success_stories.title: Real Results, Real Growth.
success_stories.description: See how our customers transformed their e-commerce businesses with Ekobol Partner Plan.
success_stories.story1_quote: With the Partner Plan, we literally focus only on making great products. Ekobol built our brand from scratch and our online sales tripled.
success_stories.story1_heading: AY Design: From Craft to Brand
success_stories.story1_p1: Ayşe, who produces handmade leather products, couldn't find time for digital marketing and marketplace management. With Ekobol's Partner Plan, she handed over all her digital operations to us.
success_stories.story1_li1_text: Sales rapidly increased with brand awareness and optimized listings.
success_stories.story1_li2_text: Ayşe now focuses solely on product development.
success_stories.story1_li3_text: Brand value was increased by creating a website and social media presence.
success_stories.story2_heading: Organic Delights: From Local to National
success_stories.story2_p1: Organic Delights, a small family business, struggled to reach wider audiences with its products. They started with Ekobol's Dynamic Plan and switched to the Partner Plan as their business grew.
success_stories.story2_li1_text: They became category leaders on Trendyol.
success_stories.story2_li2_text: Stock depletion decreased by 90% with AI-powered inventory management.
success_stories.story2_li3_text: Profit margins increased by 25% with competitive analysis.
success_stories.story2_quote: It would have been impossible for us to reach this scale in such a short time without Ekobol. They are not just software, but a true business partner.
